datastorage

Class ProductIngredientsDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastorage.ProductIngredientsDAO

  • public class ProductIngredientsDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the methods to write and retrieve data to and from a database that have to do with the ingredients of a product.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wesley Heesters, Renée Vroedsteijn, Thomas Roovers
    See Also:
    OrderManager
